definition: to salute/to pay one's respects to/to pay tribute to/to pay homage to
to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey
respectfully yours (at the end of a letter)

sentences.english: His firm was named in homage to the Beatles' record label, Apple.
sentences.chinese: 他的公司命名苹果以向披头士乐队的唱片致敬。

sentences.english: I extend my greetings to the working class of our country.
sentences.chinese: 我要向我们国家的劳动阶级致敬。

sentences.english: They all reverently bowed their heads and hearts.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都虔诚地低下了头，在心里致敬。

sentences.english: An homage to the Mufasa death scene?
sentences.chinese: 向穆法沙的死亡场景致敬？

sentences.english: The sailor dipped the ship's flag as a salute.
sentences.chinese: 水手将船上的旗升上去再降下来以示致敬。

sentences.english: Today we salute women whose triumphs are written in bold on the pages of history.
sentences.chinese: 今天我们向胜利被写在大胆在历史页的妇女致敬。
这里到处都充满着向加加林致敬的痕迹。

sentences.english: To all of them we pay tribute on the occasion of the 2010 World Meteorological Day.
sentences.chinese: 值此2010年世界气象日之际，我们谨向他们致敬。

sentences.english: He received 28 standing ovations from Democrats and Republicans alike in Congress.
sentences.chinese: 因此他受到议会中28个民主党和共和党的起立致敬。

sentences.english: He ascended the three terraces in the forefront to pay tribute at the alter.
sentences.chinese: 他登上三阶地的最前线，致敬的改变。

sentences.english: And I salute Vice Premier Wang for his leadership.
sentences.chinese: 我要向王副总理的领导能力致敬。
我们向你致敬，坠落熊2号。

sentences.english: We should tribute to all teachers of young children.
sentences.chinese: 我们要向所有培养孩子的老师致敬。
他们相互举手击掌互致敬意。

sentences.english: What can we include, to make our Father's Day salutations more special?
sentences.chinese: 我们可以囊括进哪些内容使得父亲节的致敬更特别呢？

definition: to express/to present/to extend/to tender (greetings, thanks etc)
legendary/fantasy saga/romance/short stories of the Tang and Song Dynasty
huge/great/grand/worthy of the greatest admiration/important (contribution etc)
to take a curtain call/(fig.) to come to an end
to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
(slang) to cheer sb on/to show one's support/("call" is pronounced approximately like English "call")
